original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3366)@</color>連續揮舞武器對前方施展六次攻擊，每次以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3366)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3366)@</color> Continuously swing weapons to attack the front six times, each time with <color=#ccffcc> $Skill_Str(3366)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy.
